item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hour series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Cuban Revolution on Aborn St. in downtown Providence

Always a good one to know about, Cuban Revolution "offers a spirited counter-culture environment reminiscent of a 1960s coffee house with the passion of a Latin beat... all wrapped up in a swanky setting that propels you back in time." Its a great for a quick lunch bite, dinner before a downtown event or a late night drink and nibbles.Â  No matter the time, its always easy and relaxed. They also make a great Mojito, so, let's check it out!

The bar area is large, but if it gets tight we can spill out onto the sidewalk patio seating!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a bright blue, gradated-dyed scarf, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Cuban Revolution (downtown)!
